scripts.prebuild:app:dev: npm run build:constants && npm run build:templatecache:gulp
scripts.prebuild:styles: npm run create:deploybase:css && npm run copy:vendorstyles
scripts.prebuild:styles:dev: npm run create:workbase:css && npm run copy:vendorstyles:dev
scripts.predeploy:gulp: npm run clean:target && npm run clean:deploy && npm run create:deploybase
scripts.deploy:gulp: npm run copy:resources && npm run build:styles && npm run build:templatecache:gulp && npm run build:constants && npm run build:app:gulp && npm run build:selector:gulp
scripts.predev: npm run clean:work && npm run create:workbase
scripts.dev: npm run build:styles:dev && npm run build:app:dev && npm run build:selector:dev
scripts.serve:dev: concurrently "npm run serve -s" "npm run watch:styles" "npm run watch:app" "npm run livereload" --n 'server,css,app,livereload' --c 'yellow,cyan,magenta,blue'
scripts.serve:dev-secure: concurrently "npm run serve:secure -s" "npm run watch:styles" "npm run watch:app" "npm run livereload" --n 'server,css,app,livereload' --c 'yellow,cyan,magenta,blue'
scripts.watch:dev: npm run dev && npm run serve:dev
scripts.watch:dev-secure: npm run dev && npm run serve:dev-secure
scripts.watch:app: nodemon --watch src --ext js,html --ignore src/views/templates.js --ignore src/js/poms/constants.js --exec npm run build:app:dev
scripts.watch:styles: nodemon --watch src/styles --ext scss --exec npm run build:styles:dev
